environmentVariables.name: PORT
environmentVariables.description: Port for the Node.js application to listen on

environmentVariables.name: JWT_SECRET
environmentVariables.description: Secret key for JWT token generation and verification

environmentVariables.name: SMTP_HOST
environmentVariables.description: SMTP server host for sending emails

environmentVariables.name: SMTP_FROM
environmentVariables.description: From email address for outgoing emails

environmentVariables.name: TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID
environmentVariables.description: Twilio account SID for SMS notifications

environmentVariables.name: TWILIO_PHONE_NUMBER
environmentVariables.description: Twilio phone number for sending SMS

environmentVariables.name: FRONTEND_URL
environmentVariables.description: Frontend application URL for CORS configuration

instructions: 1. Go to Azure Portal → Your Web App → Configuration → Application settings
2. Click 'New application setting' for each variable above
3. Copy the name and value exactly as shown
6. Deploy your backend code via GitHub Actions
